etymologies: mid 19th century. From Hellenistic Greek μέρισματ-, μέρισμα separated part (from the stem of μερίζειν to divide + -ισμα) + -ic

definitions: Of cell division: occurring by the formation of internal partitions (as in plant cells). Of a cell, tissue, etc.: characterized by cell division.

notes.text: Superseded in modern use by meristematic.
